entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:09 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
